attributes.action: Remove Home Secretary Priti Patel for breaching ministerial code
attributes.additional_details: Parliament & the public need to understand more about what was behind Boris Johnson's decision and on what basis he has decided she had not breached Ministerial Standards.
attributes.background: Parliament need to debate the PM's judgement regarding the Ministerial Standards report saying that the Home Secretary had "not consistently met the high standards expected of her".

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
